attributes.title: WONT LET ME TURN MY LIGHTS OFF!!
attributes.review:
I was so excited to download the app. Our president really portrays my struggle being cis, white, and middle class, something I really respect. I was practically bouncing off the walls as I opened it the first time. But just imagine my dissatisfaction and disappointment when I went to turn off my bedroom light and it WOULDN'T TURN OFF. Thatâ€™s right folks. This app is infringing on my ability to get some peaceful shut-eye. So I suffered. Through the night I tossed, I turned. Truly unable to shake the uncertainty that this app has placed upon me. It is now three days later, and I can tell you that no light in my house will budge. I fear the day that my electric bill arrives. 

This app may have been free to download, but failed to tell me that I would spend a fortune on a sleep number mattress, anger management, and eye cream for dark circles. Be warned.

attributes.title: Has no lips, will not get a kiss kiss
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because i heard it was a game about a guy named Kronald Dump but apparently its a joke about a cheeto running for president? Anyways the joke wasnâ€™t even that funny but i decided to stick around. Not even an hour into having the app i was flashed a series of pictures of the deformed cheeto, almost like a strobe light. I ended up having a seizure and had to be transported immediately to a hospital where i fell into a coma and passed away. Yeah this is actually my ghost writing this review. Anyways, the app was overall extremely disappointing so if your expecting a game DO NOT DOWNLOAD. You might also die. But not in a cool way. Your last memory will be images of a mutant that looks like if Mark Wahlberg had a one night stand with a blowfish and crunchy cheeto that somehow produced a baby. 10/10 do not recommend.

attributes.title: Zero Stars
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to see who the president was this year. I fell into a coma about 9 years ago so I was shocked to see that Obama was gone. Anyways, I opened the app and I had to call 911 because it said some Oompa Loompa Cheeto had taken office. The police were no help. So I tried deleting the app and my phone now has a virus. The screen goes completely orange and whenever I try to do anything it grabs me by the p****. Also I canâ€™t even call people on my phone because when I try to say something it just responds with â€œWRONGâ€. Also this dumb app is trying to delete my other apps. And my family has started to go missing and Iâ€™m pretty sure itâ€™s because of this app. In conclusion Iâ€™m gonna destroy my phone and burn my house down because this app ruined my life and I hope I can get a new phone in 2020.

attributes.title: Honestly terrible and disappointing. -5/10
attributes.review: I, like many, WAS a proud Trump supporter. I wanted to enjoy this app and gain insight, but Trump is only adding things to his liking which doesnâ€™t allowed for broad information. Itâ€™s very important that we educate ourselves during this time and this app only wants to fit one narrative. Trump is constantly saying donâ€™t believe this and that because itâ€™s what the left want, but he wants us to believe certain things because itâ€™s what the Republican Party aka Trump wants. Other trump supporterâ€™s want to say â€œohh this app and trump is great!â€ But letâ€™s be honest.. things have gone south! Donâ€™t lie to yourself. The economy and people are suffering. attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: would give -5 stars if i could
attributes.review:
this app seemed really exciting at first, but it got annoying pretty fast. basically it just asks you to put in headphones and stare blankly at your screen while it hypnotizes you and chants â€œTRUMP FOR DICTATOR, TRUMP FOR DICTATORâ€ and â€œTHE RAMP WAS VERY SLIPPERY (VERY SLIPPERY)â€ i sat there for maybe an hour (or more; itâ€™s vary easy to lose track of time) but eventually i had to go pee so i got up and went to the bathroom. as soon as i closed the bathroom door i couldnâ€™t help but chant as well. when i washed my hands and looked in the mirror he ğŸŠwas there staring back at me. then everything when orange and i fell into a pit and now iâ€™m stuck down here. so anyway, i think my body is possessed now, spreading hate and stupidity and suffering but iâ€™m glad i can at least write this review :)

basically, i wouldnâ€™t REALLY recommend this app?? itâ€™s kinda humid in the pit. idk
